hero.name: Furkan Cicekli
hero.title: Prayer Beads Artisan
hero.description: Master of handmade prayer beads. I combine traditional craftsmanship with modern design.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Bringing traditional craft together with modern design
about.p1: My passion for the art of prayer beads started at a young age. Over the years, I learned this craft from masters and developed my own unique style.
about.p2: I work with amber, kuka, jet stone and many other precious materials. Each prayer bead comes to life with carefully selected materials and meticulous workmanship.
about.p3: The years I spent in Kuwait allowed me to discover different cultures' understanding of prayer beads and enrich my technique.

crafts.title: My Crafts
crafts.subtitle: Unique handmade pieces, each carefully crafted with love

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Reach out for custom prayer bead orders or questions
